name: GaymerX #EveryoneGames
blurb: GaymerCon is the first gaming and tech convention with a focus on LGBT  geek culture.

rewards.reward: No Reward
SUPPORTER! Aww yeah - every coin counts towards that elusive 1UP. Anyone who donates at least 100 coins has the option to have their name (or business name) on a thank you page on GaymerCon.org!

SUPPORTER STICKER PACK:\r\n\r\nYou rock. - thank you for helping to make this a reality. GaymerCon will send you a pack of small and large GaymerCon stickers  -stick them on your computer, car, favorite SNES cartridge or dog! He won't mind.

COIN ENTERED + STICKER PACK: Yay! Welcome to GaymerCon! By donating at least $30, you will receive a 2-day badge to GaymerCon on August 3 & 4, 2013. We'll also mail you some stickers! Cool!\r\n\r\nTickets will be going for 35 presale and 40 at the door, so save your money and buy it now! Can't make it? You'll get a code you can give to a friend or donate!

BLUE OR RED GAYMERCON BITROM + STICKER PACK:\r\n\r\nWant to support the Con, but can't make it? Or just love the design of these cool BitRoms? Or want to trick your BMO into thinking you bought it a new game? Well here's your chance - comes in Fire Red and Leaf..err..Water Blue.

DONATOR PACK (OR FOR COUPLES/GROUPS): By Request! Love the idea, and just want to see this succeed and be able to get those who normally wouldn't be able to afford to come a chance to attend? Or are a couple/group of folks that all want to come together? At this level, we will give you (2) COIN ENTERED badge codes, and (1) additional COIN ENTERED code (and STICKERS) for each multiple of $25 over $50 that you put in. Easy peasy.

COIN ENTERED + STICKER PACK + BITROM: TURING & CONWAY'S ADVENUTURE (OR BLUE/RED GAYMERCON BITROM)\r\n\r\nNot only do you get to come to the Con, but you can also get one of these limited edition collectible BitRom necklaces with Turing & Conway fighting! This edition is exclusive to this Kickstarter and will never be on sale again! Ever!

BOSS MODE + STICKER PACK: Aww yeah - you're a regular old bowser ain't ya. VIP badges for GaymerCon with cool bonus features, a GaymerCon Collectible T-Shirt  and are invited to our Bosses Only Party & Fundraiser Event on Friday Night, August 2nd. VIP Passes will be going for $150 at the door.

Come meet other LGBT nerds and visionaries and get drinking! - Start the con off right and early! :)

Also: STICKER PACK! (duh)

ARTIST TABLE: Hey artist~ Yes you! You want to get your art out to the Gay Geek community? Your pledge will get you access to a COIN ENTERED BADGE as well as a reserved spot at the artist tables to do sketches, badges, and sell small trinkets and +3 ice goblets and all that fun nerd stuff.\r\n\r\nYay art! Specially priced for year one!

BITROM TRIPLE PACK: Want all three bitroms? Turing, Conway and the Limited Edition Kickstarter one? We hear ya. At this level, you get all three bitroms, and don't forget that you can either +$25 to your order for a COIN ENTERED badge or +$90 for a BOSS MODE badge. Woop de woop!
BOSS MODE + STICKER PACK + BITROM OF YOUR CHOOSING* (*except gold) - If you're a Boss, but you gots to have that BitRom swag :3

ASK A GAMING PRO!: 1 BOSS MODE, 2 BITROMS OF YOUR CHOICE (*except gold), AND JAMES PORTNOW OF RAINMAKER GAMES WILL SKYPE WITH YOU. Ever wanted to ask advice about how to break into the gaming industry? Got burning questions about the inner workings of big game developers? Want to just geek out with one of the creators of the popular web series Extra Credits? Now you can. Pledge this level and James Portnow will skype with you for at least 30 minutes and you can take advantage of his industry experience, expertise, and general awesomeness.

COUPLES BOSS PACK - 2 BOSS BADGES & 2 STICKER PACKS: <3 The couple that plays together, stays together. This package gets you two badge codes for Boss Badges and 2 sticker packs. Need more? You can add +90 per extra boss you'd like to add.

PLAYER 2 HAS JOINED THE GAME: 1 BOSS MODE PASS + GRAB BAG OF AWESOME MERCH FROM ALLY GEEK COMPANIES: Lots of companies out there think GaymerCon is such a good idea, they gave us a bunch of free stuff to shower on you for donating. This pack includes 1 Penny Arcade Mug, 1 Penny Arcade First Party Notebook, 1 Three Day Pass to Emerald City Comicon in Seattle, 1 Mega64 Time DVD, 1 Reformat the Planet Chiptune Documentary DVD, 1 Red vs Blue Season 10 DVD from Roosterteeth, and The Chainsawsuit Initiative by Kris Straub.

BOSS MODE + STICKER PACK + BITROM OF YOUR CHOOSING* (*except gold) + FRAMED CUSTOM \u201cVIDEO GAME STYLE\u201d PORTRAIT OF YOU ON THE WALLS OF GAYMERCON (that you get to keep!): So you get all that good BOSS MODE amazing stuff, right? Well, what if - and stick with us here, we got a really awesome artist to make a portrait of you (and/or your partner) to adorn our fine fair walls for all to see and gaze upon. Once the Kickstarter is over, we\u2019ll want you to send over your bio, gamertag, and more, and will post your core stats (STR: 7? Eww)  and info next to your portrait- and maybe people will be so taken with your charming illustrated gaze and sharp wit that you\u2019ll end up with an inbox full of friend requests.  Please note: You won't get to actually get your portrait until at or after the con. Because it's art. And art belongs on walls. Also, it will be cool art.

THE TEPIG SPECIAL: 2 BOSS MODE BADGES, 2 PACKS OF STICKERS, 2 BITROMS OF YOUR CHOICE (*not gold), and WE'LL FIND A BUNCH OF CUTE FIRE TYPE STUFF TO OUTFIT YOU FOR GAYMERCON: He's a fire type! He's a friend! He's a fire pig! He's Tepig! Breaking Boulders when he sees em, Making Friends when he meets em! He's Tepig! REEEEET!

BOSS MODE + GOLDEN BITROM + 2 BOSS MODES FOR YOUR POSSE + STICKER PACK:\r\n\r\nOh, ye want to be a high roller do ye? Not only do you get to enter BOSS mode, but you also get one of 15 gold Turing & Conway's Adventure BitRoms, as well as a private luncheon with the Bosses of Honor and GaymerCon crew on August 4th. You will get 2 additional BOSS MODE badges as well for friend/enemies.

BOSS MODE + GAYMERCON VIDEO THANKING YOUR SWEET BOD (OR WHATEVER) + BITROM OF YOUR CHOICE* (*except gold) + 2 BOSS MODES FOR YOUR POSSE + STICKER PACK: Just added to meet demand!! Since we have a limited # of gold cartridges, we decided instead that you could get any cartridge of your choice (except gold), but we'd also make you a (funny) video thanking you and post it on our Youtube. You also get boss mode, as well as 2 additional BOSS MODE badges as well for friend/enemies.

THE CAKE IS NOT A LIE: 2 BOSS MODE BADGES + BITROM OF YOUR CHOICE (*except gold) +  ELLEN MCLANE, THE VOICE OF GLADOS, WILL RECORD YOU A MESSAGE. Really. Want to use her as your ringtone, voicemail greeting, or have her propose to your special someone for you? As long as you keep it 30 seconds or less she will say whatever you want! (within reason...nothing naughty or crazy here kids) This will be delivered digitally.

BEATMANIA 2P BOSS MODE: 2 BOSS MODE BADGES +  2 GAYMERCONCERT BACKSTAGE PASSES + 2 BITROMS OF YOUR CHOICE (*except gold) - Video gamer & Music lover? Producer? Just want to hang with some musical musicians of coolness and sip on whatever it is that they sip on? Come on in, ze water is fine. You and your "friend" will be bleeping and bloopin in no time.

THE SNIPER SPECIAL: 2 BOSS MODE BADGES + BITROM OF YOUR CHOICE (*except gold) +  PATRICK LOWRY, THE VOICE OF THE SNIPER FROM TF2, WILL RECORD YOU A MESSAGE. Really. Want to use him as your ringtone, voicemail greeting, or have him propose to your special someone for you? As long as you keep it 30 seconds or less he will say whatever you want! (within reason...nothing naughty or crazy here kids) This will be delivered digitally.

LINE? I DON\u2019T SEE A LINE: 2 BOSS MODE BADGES + 2 BITROMS OF YOUR CHOICE (*except gold) + 2 PORTRAITS + YOU BOTH GET TO BE AT THE FRONT OF THE LINE FOR EVERYTHING : Hate waiting in line for panels, concerts, or just getting in the exhibition hall? Well you need wait no more. At this level you gain access to a special secondary line at all panels, concerts, and getting into the exhibition hall when it opens. This line goes in before the others so you get primo access all weekend long. Note: Anyone who donates $500 or more gains this privilege line privledge.

8-BIT BALLER: You're like a NES - you're the real deal, quality over quantity and the masses respect you for it. You will be listed on the back of the each program, along with all the sponsors, as one of the honorary founders who helped made GaymerCon happen and will get a custom drawing of Alan Turing (or whatever you'd like) from Zach Weiner, creator of SMBC-Comics. You will also get 4 BOSS MODE PASSES, a GOLDEN BITROM, SUNDAY SUPER LUNCHEON, and a hug.\r\n\r\nAlso, maybe we'll turn you into a robot or something? Somehow.

16-BIT SPONSORSHIP:
Like the Sega Genesis or Super Nintendo, you got that extra pep in your step to take your game to the next level.  Being an 8 Bit Sponsor gets you a table in the main expo area as well as banner space, 1 item for the VIP/BOSS bag, 5 BOSS MODE passes, 5 BITROMS (OF ANY DESIGN), and placement on the GaymerCon book and website, and our everlasting love.

You'll be able to get in front of swarms of eager gaymers, showing off your new products and wares, as well as give the BOSSES some extra swag to help promote your goodies.

64-BIT SPONSORSHIP: Mario 64. Goldeneye. Ocarina of Time. Esteemed company. 64 bit sponsors get prime real estate table/booth as well as top banner space, a booth at the VIP/BOSS event on August 2, 10 BOSS MODE passes, 10 BITROMS ( OF ANY DESIGN), and up to 3 items for the VIP/BOSS swag bag.

If you believe that getting in front of the gay geek market is a good idea, this will get you the most coverage and attachment to the project!

Want to do something more? Please email us!
